subject: Basketball
Suits and Litigation
Antitrust Laws and Competition Issues
Lockouts
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: Lawyers representing two groups of N.B.A. players have decided to merge their lawsuits against the league in the hope of expediting a resolution.
